item.title: Cloud Zoom Is Blocking My Modal Dialog Box
item.author: dave@petzel.email (David Petzel)
item.description: The issue I was having is that the Cloud Zoom enhanced image was being displayed in front of my drop down menu as well as my modal dialog box. At first I had only noticed the issue on the drop menu, and was having a hard time figuring out what was going on, and thought perhaps I had done something wrong on the superfish menu. Once I noticed it was also affecting my modal dialog, I became suspicious of cloud zoom.
